subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Mr. Stith was the forward-center who brought St. Bonaventure University to national basketball prominence in the early 1960s, then overcame tuberculosis and played for the Knicks.
snippet: Mr. Stith was the forward-center who brought St. Bonaventure University to national basketball prominence in the early 1960s, then overcame tuberculosis and played for the Knicks.
